name: ​Youth, Go straight
description:
Youth, go straight!

Young people are suffering from many setbacks due to employment and glass ceilings at work. I wanted to deliver a message to these young people that they should not give up and go a little further even if they had an ordeal, so I decided to produce this game.

game rules
Keyboard →: Forward
Keyboard ↑,↓: Defeat the ordeal.
